compliant.section: With Service Providers: We may share Your personal information with Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service, to contact You.
compliant.legal provisions: Data processing by a third party is permissible if the processor has been engaged and if sufficient guarantees are in place. This section indicates the use of data processors, which is compliant as long as there are appropriate agreements in place.

compliant.section: For business transfers: We may share or transfer Your personal information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of Our business to another company.
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is lawful if necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party.  Mergers and acquisitions fall under legitimate interest, provided appropriate safeguards are in place.

non_compliant.section: With Affiliates: We may share Your information with Our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data transfers outside the EEA are restricted unless specific conditions are met. Sharing data with affiliates, even with a policy requirement, needs further clarification on data location and safeguards. Depending on the location of the affiliates and the data, this may require a specific legal basis such as Standard Contractual Clauses.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the location of affiliates and implement appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses for data transfers outside the EEA, if applicable.
